comments:
The second Series of the second Axes can not be added to Bubble Chart

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a Bubble Chart, set Multiple Y Axis=Secondary Axis.
2. Select "Select Data" button, select "New Series..." from Value(Y) Series drop list under Y Axis 2;

Expected result:
The second Series of the second Axes can be added

Actual result:
The second Series of the second Axes can not be added

Error log:
org.eclipse.emf.common.util.BasicEList$BasicIndexOutOfBoundsException: index=2, size=2
